name: Pixan: Spirits of Naay 2018
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Guide the Pixan through Naay's jungle and restore lost harmony. You will have to experiment and study the many possible interactions with your environment in order to lead the Pixans into the heart of the jungle.

Platform : PC + HTC Vive 
Engine : Unity 
Number of players :1 

Producer : Jason GUILLAMO
Game Design : Brittany GOMES, Alexandre QUENEDEY
Game Art : Magali CHARDON, Maxime QUISSAC, Nicolas RAJOHNSON
Game Design & Programming : Jordan DACHICOURT, Meriem-Lina GHOMARI, Silouane LANTOINE
Music & Sound Design : Luc CLAVEL
